title: Obtaining Gems
text: League|Complete Internships|Complete all the Daily Tasks|Level Up to get Gem and Other Rewards|Complete the Goals in Trophies

title: Obtaining Coins
text: Campaign Loot|Daily Quiz - Coin Quiz|Alchemy|Tests|Daily Tasks|Slot Machine|Practical Work

title: Getting Girl Shards
text: Campaign Loot|Daily Quiz-Girl Quiz|Complete Internship Quest Event|Test Drop|Girl Store Sale|Slot Machines |Market Purchases|Enroll

title: Obtaining EXP Juice
text: Auto-Battle Drop|Daily Quiz-EXP Quiz|Complete all the Daily Tasks|Slot Machines|Market Purchases

title: Obtaining Lunch Boxes
text: Campaign Loot|Tests|Daily Quiz-EXP Quiz|Slot Machine(before lv.60)|Market|Transfer

title: Obtaining Seals
text: Festival Event Item Exchange|Complete Internship 6-7 stars|Festival Gift & Event Package|Market Sale

title: Improving and Upgrading Girls
text: Level up & Awaken Girl|Graduate Girl|Summon Girl

title: Improving Gear
text: Forge Gear|Collect Sets to get Set Attributes
